column4: Number of seconds until your rate limit is reset and you can begin making calls again.

For 401 errors that occur during a refresh token request, the API will respond with a WWW-Authenticate header with a value of Bearer realm="api.fitbit.com", rather than a value of Basic realm="[redirect_uri]".

column5: The authorization grant_type is not supported.

column3: code - used more than once (even if within 10 minutes)
redirect_uri - missing if specified in the redirect to the authorization page

column5: Invalid authorization header. Client id invalid.
